name: Renegade test
description:
A 2D platformer prototyped in Unity.  

A - Run right
S - Run Left
Space  - jump
Space (in air) -  double jump
Shift (while pressing A or S) - Sprint
F - dash
S + F - Ground stomp (while in the air) 
LMB (left mouse button)  or E -  Attack
LMB or E  ( while in air) - jump kick
Space ( while on wall) - Wall Jump

Have fun!
